name: Airlock Gridlock
description:
►Description◄

You are the space-traffic control operator of an overcrowded trade station. Your job is to process as many trades as possible, while at the same time keeping docking ports clear and preventing merchant vessel collisions. Constantly manage ships of all different shapes and sizes, fend off raiders and evenly distribute resources to stay in the game!

►Controls◄

  • [Mouse] → General interaction
  • [LMouse] → Select/Deselect ship
  • [RMouse] → Send ship movement instructions
  • [Space] → Advance tutorials
  • [Escape, P] → Pause/Unpause

Music, sound effects, tutorials and the custom mouse cursor can all be disabled in the options menu.

►Programs◄

  • [Java] → Programming Language
  • [Eclipse] → IDE
  • [LWJGL] → Engine
  • [Ridhvl] → Engine
  • [GIMP] → Art
  • [Photoshop] → Art
  • [Piskel] → Art
  • [Caustic] → Music
  • [BFXR] → Audio
  • [BeepBox] → Audio
  • [Audacity] → Audio
  • [JarSplice] → Packaging

►Authors◄

  • [Graphics] → JKTransformers
  • [Code/Audio] → Basset
  • [Code/Graphics] → HaveANiceDay
  • [Code/Audio/Graphics] → os_reboot

►Details◄

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 42. All assets, including font and music, are original and were created within the allotted jam time. Source code for this project can be found here. Custom engine can be found here.

Please message us here on or twitter with questions/concerns @hyprgloo or visit our github profiles at /osreboot /basset10 /haveaniceday33.
